title: Modeling {MWE}s in {BTB}-{WN
authors:
Laskova, Laska  and
Osenova, Petya  and
Simov, Kiril  and
Radev, Ivajlo  and
Kancheva, Zara
venue: Proceedings of the Joint Workshop on Multiword Expressions and WordNet (MWE-WN 2019)
abstract: The paper presents the characteristics of the predominant types of MultiWord expressions (MWEs) in the BulTreeBank WordNet â€“ BTB-WN. Their distribution in BTB-WN is discussed with respect to the overall hierarchical organization of the lexical resource. Also, a catena-based modeling is proposed for handling the issues of lexical semantics of MWEs.
